title: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync
description: Bug 4121: JarExporter causes out of Sync. The JarExporter is causing an out of sync message when overwriting the exported jar file for the second time.
OB: When exporting a directory or project and placing the exported jar file in the same directory, an out of sync message is displayed when overwriting the jar file for the second time.
EB: The exported jar file should not include itself to avoid the out of sync issue.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Export a directory or project. 
2. Place the exported jar file in the same directory or project. 
3. Overwrite the exported jar file for the second time.
